Package ss.hotel.bill

Interface Bill.Item

Enclosing class:
Bill
public static interface Bill.Item
Abstraction of the items on the bill. Every item has a price and description; the description is available with toString().

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    double
    getPrice()
    Returns the price of this Item.
